dimensions: Warp x Weft: 28.5 x 27.3 cm (11 1/4 x 10 3/4 in.)
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch (looping backward movement), on plain weave foundation
description: Upper third has two alphabets introduced by Maltese crosses and inscription, lower third has isolated floral motifs. Floral borders on four sides.
name: Sampler
